title: Ralph says 'PRD Complete' when stories are blocked
description: Ralph exits with 'PRD Complete! All X stories finished' when pending=0, but ignores blocked stories. Should only show complete when pending=0 AND blocked=0. Currently at line 3126: checks pending_count but not blocked_count.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Find completion check at line ~3126 in ralph.zsh
Add blocked_count check: only complete if pending=0 AND blocked=0
If blocked > 0, show 'PRD Blocked: X stories need manual intervention'
Test: Create blocked story, verify Ralph doesn't say 'Complete'
